summary:
Updated .esp for Morrowloot 4E incorporating the fixes from the USKP.
Bonus alternative .esp for users of Enhanced Lighting for ENB.
descriptionHtml:
This plugin carries forward the changes from either the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] or the Unofficial Skyrim Patch AND [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]Enhanced Lighting for ENB[/url] to the Morrowloot 4E plugin.

Installation Instructions:
1. Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50740/]Morrowloot 4E[/url]
2. Download JUST the mesh fixes from the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44212]Morrowloot[/url] (This prevents some crashes because of dodgy meshes)
3. Download your preferred plugin from here
4. Overwrite Morrowloot.esp with my version (You MUST download the original Morrowloot 4E for this to work!)

Keep in mind the USKP version requires USKP, and the ELE version requires USKP and ELE. If you don't have those mods you can't use these plugins.

[u]FAQ[/u]
[b]Q: What kinds of changes does the USKP Version carry forward?[/b]
A: Cell edits and NPC edits mostly. Any time Morrowloot 4E hand placed loot, or changed the equipment of an NPC it reset them to vanilla, sometimes reintroducing vanilla bugs.

[b]Q: Why on earth would a Morrowloot 4E need a patch for a lighting mod!?[/b]
A: Again its the hand placed loot. If Morrowloot 4E loads after ELE then it uses the vanilla lighting templates on every cell that has handplaced loot in it. My patch reintroduces the lighting changes from JawZ.
[i]If Morrowloot 4E loads *before* ELE in your load order, you don't actually need the ELE version, but it wont hurt anything.
[/i]
[b]Other Mods by me:[/b]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52878/?]Cultural Armors - The Khajiit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51886/?]USKP Patch for TK Children[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51860/?]Freckle Face for TK Children[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52671/?]Detailed TreeLOD for Realistic Aspens
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58622/?]Hi Res East Empire Trading Company Sign[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63463/?]Bar Rag in Grubby and Clean Versions[/url]
